en.title: Producer Price Index
en.description: Monthly producer prices broken down by MSIC section, division and group, as well as SITC section and stage of processing.

bm.title: Indeks Harga Pengeluar
bm.description: Harga pengeluar bulanan mengikut seksyen, bahagian dan kumpulan MSIC, serta seksyen dan peringkat pemprosesan SITC.
